column2: Grant and issue an order in the nature of Writ of Prohibition directing 1st
to 7th Respondents and 10th Respondent, any one or more of them not to
take  any  further  action  against  the  Petitioner  in  relation  to  the  non-
summary inquiry bearing number N.S. 75477/21 and the B-report bearing
1371/19 of the Magistrate Court of Matugama.‚Äù
